metadata.reset:
1. Sign in to the eZLO app and select the eZLO hub.
2. Select "Settings" from the My eZLO menu.
3. Click "Clean eZLO" button.

Alternatively:
1. Sign in to the eZLO app and select the eZLO hub.
2. Select "Devices" from the My eZLO menu.
3. Select Z-Wave to filter out only Z-Wave devices.
4. Open the "Z-Wave Actions" menu.
5. Click "Reset".
